      HorseshoeCrab(Vector2 position, Vector2 velocity)
      Horseshoe crabs have positions and velocities to determine their location and whether or not they are moving Their secondsCounter is initially 3 so that they begin moving when the game starts They initially have isMoving and isFound set to false.
